title: Email Address
content:
Hello,

I am able to login to my Firefox account

However I don't have access to the email address registered anymore

Is there any way of changing this?

Please let me know

Thanks
creator: desert_image

title: Firefox won't EXIT properly?
content: Instances of firefox remain active at time VISIBLE IN TASK MANAGER even after closing them out, also creating additional spaces on volume mixer as if multiple instances of firefox active when not. Also cannot select elements ublock on THIS WEBSITE to remove the STRANGE frustrating animated drop down bar that is silly with the animation at times otherwise a GREAT BROWSER AND SOFTWARE SETUP with more customization options also silly requiring user CHROME CSS FILE to do that however it is good to HAVE THAT OPTION AT ALL AND FIX FOR THIS would also be good THANK
creator: westchester5

title: need path to firefox
content: I need the path to the Firefox app. I have no desktop icon. When I right-click the Firefox icon in the Taskbar, then right-click Firefox in the list, there is no option for Properties (as there is for most other programs). In File Exlorer Options I selected "Show hidden files, folders, and drives" and then I searched This PC for firefox.exe -- it took a long time and only found several files like "AppCrash_firefox.exe_[gibberish]".
creator: whatsit1
